abstract: General Electric on Friday confirmed that it is exploring a potential sale or spinoff of its appliances business, one of the oldest at the 120-year-old conglomerate.
lead_paragraph: General Electric on Friday confirmed that it is exploring a potential sale or spinoff of its appliances business, one of the oldest at the 120-year-old conglomerate.

headline.main: G.E. Confirms Potential Sale of Appliances Unit
